channel.title: Needa dat Help
channel.description:
I got a MyBB Forums and i added a Plugin. (MyTabs). When i added it i addet a tab. I reloaded my Forums and then this shit appeared. -.-
[IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/w1r638.jpg[/img]
[code]MyBB SQL Error MyBB has experienced an internal SQL error and cannot continue.
SQL Error: 1064 - You have an error in your SQL syntax; check the manual that corresponds to your MySQL server version for the right syntax to use near ')' at line 1 Query: SELECT * FROM mybb_users WHERE uid IN() Please contact the MyBB Group for support.[/code]

item.title: Needa dat Help
item.dc:creator: @Lirimoo Lirimoo
item.description:
@Lirimoo wrote:

[quote=“SilentCJ, post:3, topic:473234”]Need to specify arguments for the IN command. IN is used just like a WHERE OR statement, for example:

WHERE uid IN(‘13791’, ‘189267’, ‘178272’)

Is exactly the same as:

WHERE uid = ‘13791’ OR uid = ‘189267’ OR uid = ‘178272’

Whoever you got that statement from obviously left you to add your own arguments.[/quote]

Thanks , fixed it.

Read full topic

item.title: Needa dat Help
item.dc:creator: @SilentCJ SilentCJ
item.description:
@SilentCJ wrote:

Need to specify arguments for the IN command. IN is used just like a WHERE OR statement, for example:

WHERE uid IN(‘13791’, ‘189267’, ‘178272’)

Is exactly the same as:

WHERE uid = ‘13791’ OR uid = ‘189267’ OR uid = ‘178272’

Whoever you got that statement from obviously left you to add your own arguments.

Read full topic

item.title: Needa dat Help
item.dc:creator: @jal_knight jal knight
item.description:
@jal_knight wrote:

If possible, go into the admin panel and remove that plugin. Ill have to show you how to manually add tabs. That is a vulnerability.

Read full topic

item.description:
@Lirimoo wrote:

I got a MyBB Forums and i added a Plugin.
(MyTabs).
When i added it i addet a tab.
I reloaded my Forums and then this shit appeared. -.-

[code]MyBB SQL Error
MyBB has experienced an internal SQL error and cannot continue.

SQL Error:
1064 - You have an error in your SQL syntax; check the manual that corresponds to your MySQL server version for the right syntax to use near ‘)’ at line 1
Query:
SELECT * FROM mybb_users WHERE uid IN()
Please contact the MyBB Group for support.[/code]
